alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 4:08AM CDT until August 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected with tides 1 to 1.5 feet above ground level. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Terrebonne, Lower Lafourche, Coastal Jefferson Parish, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Hancock, Harrison and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Now through 1 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal Flood conditions will not occur throughout the entire time of the advisory but will occur during high tide periods.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Eastern Orleans; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Lower Terrebonne; Southeast St. Tammany
